data.description: My super-energetic childhood friend, Himawari, and the beautiful, mature student council president, Cosmos, have asked me out on a date? Wait, why am I giving them romantic advise? What about my beautiful harem love comedy? Well, it's time to witness the end of the peaceful rom-com story.

data.title: I'm Attacked by an Impossible Spiral
data.description: Who would've thought my dream of a high school life would run off the rails and go down a thorny path so quickly, all because of an improbable "double confession of love"? Oh, hello. I'm Joro. Don't worry! I haven't given up on the idea of a "harem high school life" just yet.

data.description: With the "mastermind" exposed and the misunderstandings about my "evil deeds" cleared up to the student body's satisfaction, my peaceful everyday life resumes. But there's still something I haven't gotten back!

data.description: The exciting springtime of my life! I'm surrounded by beautiful giggling, jiggling girls! Wait, what the hell is this? Hey, Asunaro, you're with the newspaper club! What's this about me being the "enemy of all women" and going out with Himawari, Cosmos, and Pansy at the same time?

data.series_title: ORESUKI Are you the only one who loves me?
data.description: If there is a "god of inconvenience," he must love me! One minor slip-up and the "Three-timing Joro" article was circulated all over the school! I was back in the pit of despair when who should yank me out but the author of the article herself, Asunaro of the newspaper club.

data.title: Before I Knew it, My Tragedy Had Already Begun
data.description: "From now on I'll do everything I can for you with all my heart." That's what the new girl at school said to me! Finally a kind girl appears before me… Yeah, right!

data.title: My Conclusion After Much Consideration
data.description: I start working at Tsubaki's shop so I can afford to buy Pansy another copy of her book! It's rough since I'm not used to the job, but at this rate, I should be able to manage… Ahhh! I messed up big time!

data.description: You've got to be kidding me! Why did it all happen this way? Let's take the time now to politely reflect on everything.

Now what does this dummy want? Baseball team manager Kimie Kamata (nickname: Tampopo) suddenly drags me into the science lab. You probably think she's a cute girl since she's got a flower nickname, right? Well, that’s true. Tampopo is cute… but… but…

data.title: I May Not Be Needed
data.description: It's been decided that the school library will close for lack of people who use it! Cosmos did her best to stop it, but it wasn't enough. But apparently, if the library gets more traffic from students, it'll be saved!

data.description: I'm in a challenge with the superman rom-com protagonist of the century, Hose, with Pansy on the line! The stage is the regional championship baseball tournament!
